pageContext.claim: “The greatest overreach in the history of our Country. The Dems are obstructing justice and will not get anything done. A big, fat, fishing expedition desperately in search of a crime, when in fact the real crime is what the Dems are doing, and have done!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump makes a bold claim that Democrats investigating his finances, potential conflicts of interest and his campaign's ties to Russia are somehow committing the crime of obstruction of justice. But Congress has oversight powers well within its legal authority and there has been no real allegation of law-breaking as they begin their investigations.
